about.title: About ARWAD Trading
about.subtitle: Excellence in MRO & Supply Chain Management
about.description: ARWAD Trading is a leading regional provider of MRO solutions, spare parts, and supply chain management services. We partner with industrial and infrastructure sectors to maximize uptime, optimize operational costs, and deliver reliability when it matters most.
about.overview: With over a decade of experience in the Middle Eastern industrial sector, ARWAD Trading has established itself as a premier provider of Maintenance, Repair, and Operations (MRO) solutions. Our commitment to excellence, backed by a robust network of international suppliers and local expertise, ensures that our clients receive the highest quality components and services.
about.vision_text: To become the most trusted regional leader in supply chain management and MRO services, supporting industrial excellence across the Middle East and beyond.
about.mission_text: Delivering the right part, at the right time, with technical excellence and an unparalleled supplier network. We empower our clients to focus on their core operations while we handle the complexity of procurement and maintenance support.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: We take full responsibility for our commitments, treating every project as our own and ensuring accountability at every step.

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Round-the-clock support and rapid response times ensure that critical parts and services are always within reach.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Consistent quality and on-time delivery build the foundation of trust with our partners and clients.

competence.title: Competence
competence.description: Deep technical expertise and industry knowledge drive our ability to solve complex challenges.

knowledge.title: Knowledge
knowledge.description: Continuous learning and information sharing keep us at the forefront of industry developments.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Honest communication and ethical business practices are non-negotiable principles in everything we do.

industries.title: Industries We Serve
industries.subtitle: Specialized solutions across diverse sectors
industries.description: ARWAD Trading serves a wide range of industrial sectors with tailored MRO solutions and supply chain expertise.

water.title: Water & Desalination
water.description: Comprehensive support for water treatment plants, desalination facilities, and distribution networks with critical spare parts and technical expertise.
water.details: Our water and desalination division specializes in high-pressure pumps, membrane systems, chemical dosing equipment, and monitoring solutions. We understand the critical nature of water infrastructure and provide rapid response support.

power.title: Power Generation & Distribution
power.description: Reliable procurement solutions for power plants, substations, and electrical distribution systems ensuring continuous energy delivery.
power.details: We supply critical components for conventional and renewable power generation facilities, ensuring continuous energy production and distribution.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Complete MRO support for FMCG, chemicals, and packaging industries, minimizing downtime and maximizing production efficiency.
manufacturing.details: From production lines to packaging equipment, we provide comprehensive maintenance and repair solutions for manufacturing operations.

petrochemical.title: Petrochemicals
petrochemical.description: Specialized solutions for refineries, chemical plants, and processing facilities with stringent safety and quality requirements.
petrochemical.details: Our petrochemical division handles high-temperature, high-pressure applications with specialized materials and strict compliance standards.

mining.title: Mining
mining.description: Heavy-duty equipment support and spare parts for mining operations, ensuring productivity in demanding environments.
mining.details: We provide heavy-duty equipment support for mining operations, with expertise in wear-resistant components and bulk material handling.

infrastructure.title: Buildings & Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: End-to-end solutions for commercial buildings, airports, ports, and major infrastructure projects.
infrastructure.details: Supporting large-scale infrastructure projects with comprehensive HVAC, electrical, and safety systems maintenance.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions tailored to your needs
services.description: ARWAD Trading offers a complete range of MRO services designed to optimize your operations and reduce downtime.

procurement.title: Procurement & Supply Chain
procurement.description: Strategic sourcing and logistics management that reduces costs while maintaining quality and reliability.

customized.title: Customized Solutions
customized.description: Tailored engineering solutions designed to meet unique operational requirements and technical specifications.

automation.title: Automation & Control Systems
automation.description: Modern automation systems and control solutions that enhance efficiency and reduce manual intervention.

assessment.title: Process Assessment & Optimization
assessment.description: Comprehensive evaluation of manufacturing and maintenance processes to identify optimization opportunities.

technical.title: Technical Support & Training
technical.description: Expert guidance and hands-on training to maximize equipment performance and staff competency.

logistics.title: Logistics & Emergency Services
logistics.description: Fast and reliable delivery network with emergency response capabilities for critical situations.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Comprehensive inventory of industrial components
products.description: Browse our extensive catalog of industrial components, equipment, and spare parts.

ventilators.title: Central Ventilators & Air Filters
ventilators.description: High-performance air handling and filtration systems for industrial environments

inspection.title: Inspection & Testing Equipment
inspection.description: Advanced diagnostic and quality control instruments

spare_parts.title: Industrial Spare Parts
spare_parts.description: Comprehensive range of replacement parts for industrial equipment

cooling.title: Water Cooling & Heating Equipment
cooling.description: Thermal management systems for industrial processes

heavy.title: Heavy Equipment & Machinery Parts
heavy.description: Durable components for heavy industrial machinery

measurement.title: Measurement & Control Systems
measurement.description: Precision instruments for process monitoring and control

factory.title: Factory & Plant Components
factory.description: Standard and custom components for manufacturing facilities
